resources.string: Hello guys and girls, My name is Aditya Dixit, a student of B.Tech CSE. I\'ve developed this app for providing previous year question papers of your respected courses by which you can prepare for your semester exams quite well. I know not all the courses are available in this app but i\'ve tried my best to add courses but for some reasons i couldn\'t so get help from the papers which are available here.
